data.title: English Premier League Teams
data.meta_description: ESPN presents the participating teams in this year's English Premier League. Includes details on all teams with full English Premier League schedule and soccer stats.
data.text:
LIVE Transfer Talk: PSG's Lookman doubt opens way for Arsenal

Atalanta's Ademola Lookman hopes of joining Paris-Saint Germain are set to be dashed, but will Arsenal step in? Transfer Talk is LIVE with the latest.

Rajan Hothi

Liverpool plot surprise move for Federico Chiesa - source

Liverpool are considering a move for Juventus' Federico Chiesa before Friday's transfer deadline, a source has told ESPN.

Mark Ogden

Al Hilal close to signing Man City's João Cancelo - source

Al Hilal are closing in on the signing of João Cancelo from Manchester City, a source has told ESPN.

Rob Dawson

Arsenal's win at Villa, how Barca beat Athletic Club, more

Arsenal's win at Aston Villa shouldn't be overstated, Barcelona needed young and old stars to beat Athletic Club, and Man United deserved better than defeat at Brighton. Gab Marcotti recaps the weekend.

Gabriele Marcotti
